name: Funky Warpin
description:
CONTROLS:

Arrow keys = move ship

Space bar = fire bullet

GAMEPLAY: 
I'll leave you to figure out the game's hook on your own but I'll note one thing: when you pick up a Powerup, the blue ring around the ship indicates how long the power up is active. It is not a shield.

CREDITS:
Programming/Music/Graphics (Player and Enemies) - DJ Aloe

Bullet Graphics - Master484 http://m484games.ucoz.com/
